products.title: Zambezi 25mm Hazel Real Wood Perfect Fit Blind
products.description: As a warm dark brown wood stain, this zambezi hazel perfect fit blind is practical and oh-so stylish. Wooden shades can be used to pull the room together through co-ordinating floors and furnishing. A softer look on painted slats, this perfect fit wooden blind adds a homey, traditional finish. Using and easy clip-on fitting system, this perfect fit wooden blind is both drill and screw-free, and provides a child-safe option for your upvc windows or doors.

Using and easy clip-on fitting system, this perfect fit wooden blind is both drill and screw-free, and provides a child-safe option for your upvc windows or doors. At swift direct blinds quality is important to us, which is why your new perfect fit blind is hand-made with quality materials, in their yorkshire workshop by their team of experts, and delivered direct to your door.

products.title: Cellular Warm White Thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Cellular pleated blinds are given their namesake because their 'celluar shade' is made of layers bonded together to creae honey-comb shaped pockets which trap air inside and limit heat transfer from the window. These pockets create the attractive pleating effect on the front and slow down the heat loss in your room. If you're looking for energy efficient blinds, celluar pleated blinds are effective at keeping your house warm during the winter and cool during the summer.
